storyInfo:
Based upon what other operators have said, Rosmontis's attitude towards the outside world seems to be different from that of ordinary people.
Elsewhere, as Ch'en prepares to take her leave, she finds her road forward blocked by Hoshiguma.

attributes.content: Uptown Lungmen 7:00 P.M., Dusk
A secret arrest warrant? For Ch'en Sir?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: It's gotta be a mistake? There's no way...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hey! Get back here! I asked you if this was a mistake or not!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Damn it, Ch'en Sir, what the hell... who's behind this?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I have to find her. I have to hear her side of the story!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Yes. I understand.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Anything else, Master?
attributes.name: Greytail

attributes.content: No. Go and do what I told you for now. When you're finished, find somewhere to lay low for a while.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Greytail

attributes.content: Now go. Hurry.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ——*Sigh*. It turns out there really is someone who can outplay Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Talulah, Talulah... is this really just fate?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Oh, Young Master, if you could see us now from up there, you also would not wish to see this, would you?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But alas, Lungmen's finally come to this.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But Hui-chieh... Hui-chieh! Be careful, Hui-chieh... You mustn't get yourself killed!
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Lungmen Harbor Dock 7:20 P.M.
Guh... agh! Nng... grrgh...
attributes.name: Herd

attributes.content: Damnit, there's still so many of them out there... I thought the L.G.D. was supposed to have this area under control?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yesterday it was Reunion, today it's these weird Infected. Even we can't hold them off. And we can't use heavy-duty weapons inside the city...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hello, Operators. Is that who we're fighting today?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis! Thank goodness, we're saved.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They're Infected who have been twisted by Arts...? And we can't stop them?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's right. We mostly brought defense equipment, but I never expected that they'd shred through our steel cables and polyfiber nets like paper. We might have to bring in some military-grade weapons.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We're at our limits here, so we had no choice but to ask for backup from the landship. Thankfully, now that you're here, we might be able to turn the tides.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The Originium structure inside makes their bodies incredibly tough. We use suppressing fire to keep them under control. Also... our scans aren't picking up any signs of brain activity at all.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The main point there is, they're pretty much... already physically dead. They're just empty husks, propped up by Arts. It's unbelievably cruel...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Whoever did this... has to pay.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But more importantly, at least you all are safe.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Let's make a plan. I'll... get them to settle down.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor... have you never met Rosmontis before?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Please stand aside, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Then, you might want to take a step back. I guarantee you've never seen anything like this.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.options: Is that a metal box from the landship flying by?!;...?;That thing floating in the air there, is your equipment?

attributes.content: It's mine.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Operator, please describe your impressions of the target.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hold on, I'll check the manual... Okay, the target's, uh, a large group of active, restless individuals?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They're moving as a group with no clear objective. Their general trend is clear, but with no set route. That should be good enough, right?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Received. I'll handle this.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit was very clear, once we finish with this, Rhodes Island is to leave Lungmen immediately...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Evening, old friend.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma...? What are you doing here? How about your injuries?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm an Oni. Those scratches are long gone.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Good. Now, I—
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hold on. Were you waiting for me here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That dune buggy you're pushing is a new model from Rim Billiton, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: 'Great for off-road performance. Dustproof, climbs hills with ease, incredible range and fuel efficiency. Minimal environmental impact with maximum comfort.' That one?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yeah, sorry. I saw that ad on the terminal a million times. Guess it got stuck in the old noggin.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's a damn good buggy though. I'm not even into off-roading and I'd like to get one.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What are you trying to say?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You look like hell, Ch'en. Where do you plan on going?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: How did you know I'd be here...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You come here every time you want to sneak out of the city. Remember, I also know every nook and cranny of this place.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The L.G.D. issued an arrest warrant.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But that's not what you're here for.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course not. I know exactly what kind of person you are.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This is my only way out of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I stayed dark the whole way. If the whole L.G.D. knew me half as well as you do...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then you'll never make it out of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Excuse me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What do you mean by that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They're just like me. They don't want you to go.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma... are you going to stop me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Why you, of all people, Hoshiguma?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course I am, Ch'en. I'm an L.G.D. inspector, and more importantly, your friend.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Did you serious plan to wander off and play the lone hero on a grand adventure? That is precisely why I cannot let you leave.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're a Lungmenite, Hoshiguma!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is our last chance. If Wei Yenwu has it his way, more people are going to die!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And your way is better?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They call you 'Madame Oni.' They trust you to take care of the Lungmen they love so much. Let me go, Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Hah.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Do they really love Lungmen, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Me? I'm old school.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Comics, movies, booze, rainy streets, some guy running by without an umbrella. I like my stuff retro, just not bikes.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: People say some stuff goes out of style quick. Ch'en, can we really outrun time itself?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I can't. No way. It moves too fast. That chase has crushed so much of what I cared about.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This is all I have left. A yellowed splotch, a tear, a dog-eared page. I've got names for 'em all.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And it sucks. I hate how time took all these people from me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They died horrible, miserable deaths, sacrificing themselves to try to find a place in this world. But me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I simply watched them all vanish into dust. Some of them? I smashed their dreams to pieces with these very two hands.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They didn't love Lungmen. They simply had nowhere else to go. And in the end, that was my fault.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're not going anywhere, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ah Faat died, all those people died for Lungmen... You're going to pretend you never saw any of that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't act like you knew them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They were with me a lot longer than you. I knew them much better than you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's my duty to protect Lungmen. No matter who stands in my way, it's my duty. That hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So you're still Superintendent Ch'en? And who gave you this duty?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Is that just something you wanted to hear yourself say?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Look at you. You're gonna save Lungmen all by yourself? One woman against all of Reunion? Your temper tantrum won't get you that far.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's funny. You're the one who always carried out Mr. Wei's orders, because you could relate with him. Now I'm the one who relates with him a bit better, and I'm the one carrying out his orders. How the tables have turned.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I've seen the gist of Mr. Wei's plans. If someone has to die, Mr. Wei thinks it ought to be him. You're carrying the Ch'en family's blood. Once all this blows over, no one's coming after you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You mean, he—
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Mr. Wei would rather he die than you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You give him too much credit.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Maybe you don't give him enough, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If he wants to die, he's welcome to it. But what will that get us? What's the point? Will it prevent a war? Will it get Lungmen out of this mess?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If he dies, it'll get some of the blame off Lungmen. I think all the blame will pretty much vanish into thin air, actually.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You really think it'll be that easy?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nothing's ever that easy. That's why he wants you running the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You'll get his job and be Chief of the L.G.D. sooner or later. After that, you'll become the boss of the entire city.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: There's been a lot of rot left behind, and you should be the one to clean it out.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I get what Mr. Wei wants from you. Though he's been waiting for a long time, I can tell that his beliefs and methods haven't changed from the day I met him.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Lungmen still needs you. And she doesn't want you in danger.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm just so disgusted.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Mr. Wei's death may not matter to you. But once he's gone, you can change this city.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I have to tell you something, Hoshiguma. It's the reason I don't belong here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't mess with me, Ch'en. No one's more Lungmen than you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm an Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Since when...?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Three years ago.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've been hiding it from me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I didn't mean to...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How come you didn't even tell me...?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu didn't want anyone to know. We couldn't have an Infected in the L.G.D. So I couldn't be Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hoshiguma, there is no place for the Infected here. Or anywhere else in the world.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've had enough of Wei Yenwu controlling us. I'm not going to be his tool anymore.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No. I get it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I finally... actually, really get it, Ch'en. I know exactly why you can't leave Lungmen.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If you leave and go to that core city, Mr. Wei would have to brand you an enemy. Not just an enemy, but a dangerous Infected enemy working against Lungmen...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The whole city would know you're Infected. They might even think you're working with Reunion.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And that'll be the end of it. You'll never be able to come back.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't care.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's my line.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: 'You're Infected? I don't care.'
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't care. Missy doesn't care. Nine doesn't care. The L.G.D. doesn't care.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Not even Mr. Wei cares. He wants you to change this place. He doesn't want you gone.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You didn't see how ruthlessly he treated the Infected. I did.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And Nine? She's already gone. She quit the L.G.D. because she was Infected too.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Nine too...?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You know, Nine and I might've contracted Oripathy on the same mission.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She went undercover for me in Reunion... And then, because of Reunion, she abandoned Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because she saw the truth of this city.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But you didn't betray Lungmen. I'm not letting you take the fall for a crime you didn't commit.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma, why do you think... I'm going to the core city?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've never been good at guessing games. Just get to the point.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Heh...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do you know who's leading Reunion?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I forgot her name.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Talulah.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Missy didn't tell you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Tell me what?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Talulah is my sister.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh. Ohhh... Hah. I get it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ch'en, you're not going today.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Why...? Is my sister, my family... not important enough?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's why...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's why I can't let you go.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Even if I have to die here. I'm not letting you go.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's not for you to decide, Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hannya can decide.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: —No matter what stands in my way, whether it's a Catastrophe, a shield, or an Oni, I'm not giving in!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The blacksmith who cast this shield had his whole family killed by a gang of wandering Onis. His fury is much more toxic than any Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The blood that stains this shield, and the tragedy it represents... is much more wicked than any Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ch'en, Mr. Wei isn't a good man. We can kick his ass together.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Whatever you want to do, I'll do it with you. You want my Columbian Big Single 70 vv? It's yours.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ch'en, now's not the time. Don't go. Don't force me to do this. It's all I ask.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Force you? Why are you talking like Wei Yenwu...? I don't like it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: When Wei did what he did... no.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: When he betrayed his brother, failed my mother, and put this city to sleep under his cloud of wickedness, that's when I decided to do this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You might think that stuff has anything to do with you, but I don't think so.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What he did, what he did for you, and what you should be doing, none of it is connected.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's what Mr. Wei was hoping for. He didn't want to play the bad guy. He's not power-hungry...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: He gave you the sword.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...You don't get it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Understand what?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It wasn't just one time. It happened again, and again, and again... I destroyed my home, I destroyed my family.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Covered horn to toe in blood every time, I fought to the bitter end, until I was the only one left standing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Because that's what I thought was right. And they were wrong.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I found myself asking a lot if I really deserved to live.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't. But I lived anyway. I just can't live for myself anymore.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Putting yourself out because of some concept of right and wrong... that's the dumbest thing a person can do.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And I've dealt with the regret my whole life.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You think you're the only one who's got a lot of baggage, Miss Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Stop talking like that!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...So why can't you understand me, even a little bit?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We've been through so much together, all these years. There's still something you can't tell me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I've got my baggage and you've got yours. We both know that. Even so...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What is there you still don't understand? I never pulled any of you into this! How can you say I don't understand you?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because I've seen too many people die for nothing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't care who you are. I just care where you're going.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm not letting you go. This is all on the leader of Reunion. You can't change the situation. You'll just die for nothing too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No one wants to see that. Not the L.G.D., not Lungmen.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: —Thank you, Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I'm still going.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If we have to fight, you should know I'm not scared of you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You really have to go, huh? You feeling like your heart is hard as iron right now?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I told you before, you're lost in your own thoughts, you lost sight of everything around you, of everything everyone's done for you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Your stubbornness is only gonna get you hurt.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Fine. I guess you'll have to take a beating before you can learn, like a young Hoshiguma, that being a stubborn ass is just a stupid impulse.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If you want to fight, Ch'en... Then let's do it. Show me everything you've learned in the last two years.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Stop. Talking. Like. That.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: EX-42 Long-Range Originium Arts Control Device, Operator Rosmontis, requesting approval.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Approved for use in defensive operations. Removal approved.
attributes.name: PRTS

attributes.content: User: Annihilation Specialist, Elite Operator Rosmontis. Activation approved.
attributes.name: PRTS

attributes.content: Okay. I'm going.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Please tell Closure for me, about the Rhodes Island landship startup.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hurry, Doctor, get in the cabin. Don't watch.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If you get hit by Rosmontis's shrapnel, you're pretty much a goner.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator
